name: Turf Wars (itch)
description:
Turf Wars is a fun and challenging turn based strategy game where the objective is to defend against a mass attack of enemies using weapons and barricades. Each turn, enemies will move closer and threaten to break down your defenses and claim your turf. Keep them at bay for the duration of the attack and prove that you are no push over.

Can you stand your ground and defend against the endless attack of an opposing gang?

Features 

  • 30 challenging missions of increasing difficulty
  • Unlock player characters, weapons, bombs and defenses as you go
  • 15 different enemies to take on with an array of attacks and abilities.
  • 7 different locations to defend
  • Use the in game store to buy and upgrade weapons and defenses
  • 3 difficulty levels 'Snitch', 'Mobster' and 'Boss'
